messages.subject: Book Title and Author for Parselmouth
messages.msgSnippet: Ren, I think it was you who I told about the book. I now have the correct title and author s name. Behaving As If The God In All Life Mattered , by MacHaelle
messages.messageBody:
Ren, I think it was you who I told about the book. I now have the correct
title and author's name.
"Behaving As If The God In All Life Mattered", by MacHaelle Small Wright
I found it on Amazon. IT is a little "out there" for some folks, but very
interesting and I found it particularly poignant for myself and my
experiences with animals.
Nancy in BC


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
